name: Petzl Oscillante Pulley
description: Aluminum sidewalls with nylon sheave keep this pulley light. Side walls swing for easy rope access.Use with ropes from 7–11mm.Sheave diameter is 25mm.Self-lubricating bushings.Breaking load of 15kN, working load of 2-4kN.For emergency self-rescue only, not for organized rescues or tyrolleans.
